item.description:
Maddy’s Lounge
1639 Broadway
Rte 1 so/ Rte 99
Saugus, MA 01906

...…Maddy’s Christmas party for the ladies.

Last XMAS party was a huge success and a lot of fun. Don't miss out on it this year.

Time: 6:00 pm to 1:30 am with complimentary buffet & DJ JODI

This will be the best X-MAS party that you will attend this year. Maddy’s will be completely decorated with X-MAS decorations that will put you in the X-MAS spirit. This is going to be a very festive time to spend with your friends and family. Make sure you don’t miss out on this one.

1st 100 people will receive a raffle ticket for several FREE gifts underneath the X-MAS tree. We will also have a gift for the best X-MAS Costume

We will also be doing 50/50 raffles for those who want to take a chance on winning some extra money for the holidays.

Percentage of the proceed will be towards the Women Wakefield Softball League.

$20.00 includes: Comedy Show, XMAS Party, Buffet and dancing, etc, etc....

$15.00 includes: XMAS party, Buffet and dancing, etc, etc........

• Free Parking
• 21+, Proper I.D. required
• Hi Def TV (Sports Channel)
• Plenty of seating
• Great FOOD
• HUGE dance floor
• Premium Liquor
• KENO
• $15.00 cover charge
• Pleasant lounge area (separate room)

PURCHASE TICKETS AT: www.BlushBoston.com
item.name: 2nd Annual Christmas Party with Comedian Poppy Champlin
